name: Rock-Paper-Scissor Retro Arcade
description:
How To Play:
Click Space/Enter To start
Kill all the falling black by choosing their weakness

Hint - Click the Falling hands with the correct

This is my first game jam entry for the 154th Weekly Game Jam - "Rock paper scissors" theme!

KeyBindings (QWE-are also for Difficulty)
Q - Rock
W-Paper
E-Scissor
R-Ability
